name: Into the Stratosphere
description:
It's finally time for your final exam at the Wizard Academy! In this exam you and your classmates have to find magic objects scattered through the realm. Travel across many different biomes and fight strong opponents in order to get the magic objects needed to pass your exam! 

(This is not an easy game expect to die quite a lot...) 

Development Progress:

Into the Stratosphere started it's development in late 2020 and was originally known as "Pixel Pray". This game is being made solo by: J4cko.16  (Jackson Sipes)

Ver 0.1

  • Game Prototype Uploaded

Ver 0.2 

  • added pause and custom camera functions witch can be used with E or Esc

Ver 0.3

  •  added a new unlockable difficulty
  • more advanced boss fights
  • a way to delete save data

Ver 0.3.1

  • Minor Bug Fixes

Ver 0.3.5

  • added a dash ability
  • minor UI improvements
  • zoomed the camera out a bit

Ver 0.3.5.1

  • Minor Enemy and Weapon Balancing Changes

Ver 0.3.5.2

  • Boss Patches and modifications

Ver ALPHA

  • OST has been added to the game
  • Slight Graphical Updates
  • Minor Bug fixes

Ver 1.0

  • Changed name to "Into the Stratosphere" 
  • Added dialogue between each area with several dialogue responses and outcomes and random npcs to talk to
  • Remade entire tutorial
  • Sprites updated from pixel art to vector images
  • Complete overhaul on the enemies UI  and stats
  • 3 new boss fights
  • got rid of "Insane" difficulty setting
  • added cutscene for final boss
